description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a 10% Vitamin C serum designed for Oily and Combination skin. Formulated with Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, it delivers brightening and fades dark spots benefits. Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen.

ingredients.Vitamin C: A powerful antioxidant that brightens skin tone and reduces signs of aging
ingredients.Hyaluronic Acid: A moisture-binding ingredient that hydrates and plumps the skin

usage_guide.full_instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

precautions: Perform patch test before first use
